ai-vv32:1.1_0: The deities are Like, and the deities
ai-vv32:1.2_0: in the royal capital of Kāsī is burning.
ai-vv32:1.4_0: and the people of Dhamma king.
ai-vv32:3.2_0: and a meal offering in the guest house—
ai-vv32:4.1_0: Kesinda, do you love so high—
ai-vv32:4.4_0: Explain, declare, you don’t ask us.”
ai-vv32:5.2_0: He brought people together with wealth,
ai-vv32:5.3_0: she endures her husband and does what he says.
ai-vv32:6.2_0: I lovedged with a confident heart.
ai-vv32:6.3_0: At this time the one who puppeds all,
ai-vv32:6.4_0: as I was consummate with fame—
ai-vv32:7.1_0: and because of that good deeds,
ai-vv32:7.3_0: Long life, beauty, happiness, and strength,
ai-vv32:8.2_0: they’d answer my question, not my lady.
ai-vv32:9.2_0: a woman wherever a man is seen.
ai-vv32:9.4_0: so brought them to this throat.
ai-vv32:10.1_0: like a lion in a mountain cave,
ai-vv32:10.4_0: Khemā eat a meal of meat.
ai-vv32:11.1_0: So too, a noble disciple of faith
ai-vv32:11.4_0: He rejoices in heaven for an eon.’”
